product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Bike Bib Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool bib shorts offer a supportive fit along with cool-running comfort in sunny conditions, letting you focus on the miles ahead and not your clothing. In-R-Cool(R) fabric reflects the sun's rays to reduce fabric surface temperature, helping keep you cooler in sunny conditions. Fabric also transfers moisture to the outer surface for fast evaporation, plus it offers UPF 50 protection from the sun's rays. Mesh bib uppers wick moisture away from skin and help keep shorts stable and in place for all-day comfort. Side mesh vents provide ventilation in warmer conditions. Anatomic 6-panel design offers balanced support and comfort. 4-way stretch Elite 3D chamois is pre-shaped and has 13mm of variable density padding to cushion, reduce friction and wick moisture. Chamois features active carbon yarns to help reduce odors and regulate temperature. Silicone leg grippers on hems help hold shorts in place; shorts have 9 in. inseam (on size medium). Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool bib shorts have reflective highlights to improve your nighttime profile.
